QuestData.Title: The Problem with Containing a Death Loa
QuestData.Description:
Me know Mueh'zala still be hidin' someting. Ol' Bwonsamdi gonna find out what dat be.
But dis old loa's presence be drawin' all da undead in Nazmir ta me doorstep!
Me be needin' some time ta get Mueh'zala talkin'.
Dere be a troll, Zel'han, leadin' da undead. Kill him and show Mueh'zala him broken armor.
Dat should end any hope he be havin' of escapin'.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: This spirit is leading Mueh'zala's forces to attack the Necropolis!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Zel'han the Betrayer and recover his armor.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Show Zel'han's broken armor to Mueh'zala.
QuestData.RewardText:
Me got plans older dan you, $r. Slaying Zel'han mean noting ta me... ya understand?
<Mueh'zala's gaze remains focused on the broken armor in front of him.>
